title: Developer workflow poised for change as AWS advances continuous-learning AI agents
description: For all the hype around artificial intelligence coding assistants, many treat every session as a blank slate — no memory of yesterday’s preferences, context or institutional knowledge. That’s the gap agentic AI aims to close, not just helping developers write…
